duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle residential and commercial closings and ancillary real estate matters.
Work with a team of paralegals to support real estate transactional law.
Provide friendly customer service and constant communication with clients.
Utilize sharp critical thinking skills to work under pressure and meet deadlines.
Possess a background in accounting and/or bookkeeping for additional support.
Opportunity to grow and become an expert in the real estate law field.

education_certification.credential: Juris Doctor (JD) degree from an accredited law school.
